altTitles.zh-hk: 外傷重症中心：黃金救援

altTitles.th: Golden Hour ชั่วโมงโกงความตาย

altTitles.ru: Травматологический Центр Доктора Пак Кан Хёк

description.en:
Patients who can be potentially saved, die every day. And to prevent that, a doctor takes a stand. A doctor, with a strong sense of duty and responsibility. A doctor, who stands as an angel in the Trauma Center. Witness traumatologist Baek Kang-Hyuk's journey as he restores the Trauma Center to its original glory. 

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)
description.fr:
Des patients qui peuvent être potentiellement sauvés meurent chaque jour. Et pour éviter cela, un médecin prend position. Un médecin, avec un sens aigu du devoir et des responsabilités. Un médecin, qui se présente comme un ange au centre de traumatologie. Soyez témoin du parcours du traumatologue Baek Kang-Hyuk alors qu'il restaure le centre de traumatologie à sa gloire d'origine.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)
description.id:
Banyak pasien meninggal padahal mereka bisa hidup jika ditangani dengan tepat. Sejak Baek Kanghyuk masuk ke Trauma Center ini, hal tersebut tidak boleh terjadi. Dokter jenius yang dingin dan kasar, tapi sebenarnya peduli banget! Apakah dia bisa mengembangkan Trauma Center ini?!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)
description.ko:
살 수 있는 환자들이 죽어 가고 있다.
이제 더는 그런 일이 없도록 하겠다.
사명감 있는 또라이.
중증외상센터의 난폭한 천사.
외상외과 전문의 백강혁.
그의 중증외상센터 되살리기 프로젝트.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)
description.ru:
Пациенты, которых, казалось бы, еще можно спасти, умирают ежедневно. И, будучи недовольным столь несправедливым положением дел, он решает взять ситуацию под свой контроль. Его настолько переполняет чувство ответственности, что в конце концов он становится живым воплощением ангела, оберегающего местный травматологический центр. Станьте свидетелем приключений травматолога Пэк Кан Хёка, что восстановит честь Травматологического центра!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)

มีผู้บาดเจ็บอีกมากที่ควรรอดชีวิต แต่ต้องตายเพราะระบบสังคมที่เน่าเฟะ" หมาบ้าแห่งวงการศัลยแพทย์ ประจำแผนกอุบัติเหตุ 'แบ็กคังฮยอก' จะช่วยชีวิตผู้คนและเปลี่ยนระบบสังคมนี้ได้หรือไม่

description.zh:
重症外伤野蛮天使们，
展开与死亡的决斗！
有生存机会的患者不幸死亡？绝不能让这种事情再次发生！人称疯狗的外伤外科教授白江赫带领重症外伤中心与死亡展开较量！

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/shengsijizhenke/list?title_no=1493)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1976)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1876)
description.zh-hk:
有機會活下來的患者們竟然漸漸走向死亡，我要改變這一切，不再讓這種事情發生…人稱瘋狗的白江赫外科醫師誓言重新整頓外傷中心！

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/golden-hour/list?title_no=1936)
